author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO MOVE NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES TONIGHT INTO EARLY FRIDAY... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS, A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LARGE AND DESTRUCTIVE WAVES...
summary: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO MOVE NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES TONIGHT INTO EARLY FRIDAY... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS, A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LARGE AND DESTRUCTIVE WAVES... As of 3:00 PM GMT Thu Sep 25 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.7, -35.1 with movement E at 32 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE EXPECTED TO MOVE NEAR OR OVER THE AZORES TONIGHT INTO EARLY FRIDAY... ...EXPECTED TO BRING HURRICANE CONDITIONS, A DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND LARGE AND DESTRUCTIVE WAVES... As of 3:00 PM GMT Thu Sep 25 the center of Gabrielle was located near 36.7, -35.1 with movement E at 32 mph. The minimum central pressure was 981 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
